Dear [Client],

Thank you for considering me for your social media marketing needs. I have put together a proposal outlining the services I can provide and their corresponding pricing.

Here are the packages that I am offering:

1. Content provided by you
2. Thumbnail
3. Caption
4. Hashtags
5. Scheduling

This package is priced at $150, which includes services for TikTok, Facebook, Instagram, and LinkedIn.

In addition to the base package, I am also offering the following add-ons:

1. Social Media Automation for Messenger, Instagram, SMS, Emails, WhatsApp
2. Designing of regular social media posts
3. Website SEO and Copywriting

These add-ons are also available for TikTok, Facebook, Instagram, and LinkedIn.

The total cost for the base package with add-ons is $239.5. Please note that this pricing includes any applicable transaction fees, US tax, and other charges.

If you choose to purchase all services offered, the total cost would be $283/month.

I believe these packages offer the right combination of services to meet your social media marketing needs. If you have any questions or would like to discuss this proposal further, please don't hesitate to contact me.

Thank you for considering my proposal, and I look forward to the opportunity to work with you.

Best regards,

[Your name]
